Nav.btn-client-mobile: Get Cozy Drive on your mobile!
Nav.banner-txt-client: Get Cozy Drive for Desktop and synchronise your files safely to make them accessible at all times.

empty.timeline_photos_title: You don't have any photos yet.
empty.timeline_photos_text: Click the "Upload" button to add photos.
empty.albums_title: You don't have any album yet.
empty.albums_text: Start by clicking "New album" to create your first album.
empty.album_photos_title: There is no photo in this album yet.
empty.album_photos_text: Start by clicking "Add photos to album" to add some.
empty.shared_album_photos_title: There is no photo in this album yet.

Error.albums_title: An error occurred while retrieving the albums list. Please try again later.
Error.album_photos_title: An error occurred while retrieving the album's photos list. Please try again later.
Error.timeline_photos_title: An error occurred while retrieving the photos list. Please try again later.
Error.public_album_error_title: An error occurred while retrieving the photos list. Please try again later.
Error.public_album_unshared_title: Sorry, this link is no longer available.
Error.public_album_unshared_text: One lost, ten found... or just check out with the owner for help. This file might not be lost.
Error.generic: An error occurred, please try again.
Error.album_rename_abort: The album name can not be empty.

loading.photos_indexing: Your photos are currently being indexed. Please wait.
loading.albums_indexing: Your albums are currently being indexed. Please wait.

photos.fetching_error: An error occurred during photos fetching.
photos.already_added_photo: This album already contains this photo.

add_photos.title: Add to album
add_photos.success: Album %{name} has been updated with %{smart_count} photo. |||| Album %{name} has been updated with %{smart_count} photos.

error.generic: An error occurred when updating the album, please try again.
error.reference: Some photos has not been added to the album. Please check and try again.

response.Forbidden: Application does not have permission to update albums.

shareByLink.subtitle: By public link
shareByLink.desc: Anyone with the provided link can see and download your photos.
shareByLink.fetchFailed: Woops! It seems your connectivity is limited, try again later when it gets better.
shareByLink.copied: Link has been copied to clipboard

shareByEmail.title: By email
shareByEmail.subtitle: By email
shareByEmail.emailPlaceholder: Enter the email address or name of the recipient
shareByEmail.genericSuccess: You sent an invite to %{count} contacts.
shareByEmail.comingsoon: Coming soon! You will be able to share documents and photos in a single click with your family, your friends, and even your coworkers. Don't worry, we'll let you know when it's ready!

unshare.title: Remove from album
unshare.success: You removed this shared album from %{email}.

protectedShare.title: Coming soon!
protectedShare.desc: Share anything by email with your family and friends!

error.generic: An error occurred when creating the album share link, please try again.
error.revoke: An error occurred when revoking the album share link, please try again.

panel_form.label: Add a name to your new album

create.success: Album %{name} has been created with %{smart_count} photo. |||| Album %{name} has been created with %{smart_count} photos.

error.generic: An error occurred when creating the album, please try again.
error.already_exists: The album %{name} already exists, please pick another one.
error.name_missing: You have to give a name to your album.

error.index_missing: An albums index must be provided to fetch albums.

remove_photos.success: The photo has been removed from album %{album_name}

error.generic: An error occured while removing the photo, please try again.
An error occured while removing the album, please try again.
An error occured while leaving the album, please try again.

noviewer.title: The viewer doesn't know how to read this type of file yet.

loading.error: This file could not be loaded. Do you have a working internet connection right now?

destroyconfirmation.title: Permanently delete this album?
destroyconfirmation.forbidden: You won't be able to access this album or selection anymore.
destroyconfirmation.link: If you have shared it, people won't be able to access it.

quitconfirmation.title: Permanently leave and delete this shared album?
quitconfirmation.forbidden: You won't be able to access this album or selection anymore.

DeleteConfirm.title: Delete this element? |||| Delete these elements?
DeleteConfirm.trash: It will be moved to the Trash. |||| They will be moved to the Trash.
DeleteConfirm.restore: You can still restore it whenever you want. |||| You can still restore them whenever you want.
DeleteConfirm.shared: If you have shared it, people won't be able to access it. |||| If you have shared them, people won't be able to access them.
DeleteConfirm.related: Some of the photos within the selection are related to an album. They will be removed from it if you proceed to trash them.

UploadQueue.header: Uploading %{smart_count} photo to Cozy Photos |||| Uploading %{smart_count} photos to Cozy Photos

alert.success: %{smart_count} photo uploaded with success. |||| %{smart_count} photos uploaded with success.
alert.success_conflicts: %{smart_count} photo uploaded with %{conflictNumber} conflict(s). |||| %{smart_count} photos uploaded with %{conflictNumber} conflict(s).
alert.errors: Errors occurred during the photos upload.
